message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $9,500.  Given its worth, I believe this is a very fair starting point. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $8,200 is a tempting offer, I know the true value of this product.  Could we meet halfway at $8,850?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
